item.title: Safezones not working!
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

[quote=“jSiK, post:1, topic:543718”]public boolean inLumby() {
return(absX > 3216 && absX < 3205 && absY > 3226 && absY < 3212 || absX > 3216 && absX < 3205 && absY > 3212 && absY < 3226);
}

im trying to make lumby castle safe but it wont work for me. :([/quote]
:palm:
if absX is greater than 3216 and if absX is less than 3205…
That says it right there…your coordinates are backwards.

A little reading and a small attempt to understand the code that lay in front of you works wonders…
